snippet.title: Vitamin Connection - Available Now!
snippet.description: Prepare for a huge dose of fun in a microscopic world — either solo or together with a partner — in Vitamin Connection, coming soon exclusively to Nintendo Switch! As Vita-Boy and Mina-Girl, you’ll take control of the minuscule Capsule Ship to battle evil bacteria, conquer numerous sub-games, and protect the Sable family from a variety of hazardous and increasingly wacky predicaments! Available only on Switch!
